name: Zeta: 2D Space Shooter
description:
A Basic Space 2D Topdown Space Shooter I created for study! Fight through hordes of enemies and a BIG surprise in the last level! Enjoy.

List of Modifications:

1.Some Sprites were modified such as the UI Backdrop, player sprite, enemy sprite, and projectiles.

2.Title menu art added.

3.Infinitely Scrolling background added.

4.Custom Levels.

5.Modified Enemy behavior and stats.
